properties.areaDesc: Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary; 5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI including Bois Blanc Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 6 at 6:00PM EST until January 8 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Highest gusts up to 30 kt and highest waves around 7
feet.

* WHERE...5NM East of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Light MI
including Bois Blanc Island and Presque Isle Light to Sturgeon
Pt MI Including Thunder Bay National Marine Sanctuary.

* WHEN...Until 6 AM EST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM EST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
